name: Sword of the Black Stone
description:
Sword of the black stone tells the story of Sanie the barbarian and her quest to god hood.
Join her in this action adventure game with 3d third person fantasy style gameplay inspired by 3d classics, travel through forest mountains waters and even worlds in order to defeat Darkvol and his demon hordes.
Battle monsters with your sword and defend your self with your shield but watch your back
Use an aray of different items and weapons like the spark bow and bomb berries to defeat enemies and reach new places to far to jump with the silk blaster, use your bombs wisely and watch out hidden treasures.
Meat up with people like Grace and Bala and complete side quests to build a team and mow down enemies with your combined attack power.
Solve block puzzles and timed platform challenges with Shades ocarina to earn gold and even more rewards don't forget to save your gold for special items and supplies like bombs, light flower seeds.
If your stuck try the ocarina Near floating orbs not every block moves you know.
Its dark in the dark palace use light flow seeds to grow light flows to light the way.
Its not always about muscle pay attention to people and solve the Riddler statues riddles to open new paths and obtain new items.
Each monster is different so use the right weapon for the occasion, bosses are no push over either so use the right tool for the job.
Challenge your self in a hidden special stage with challenges, puzzles and boss rush tower to really put you to the test.
the world is split in two time to sow it back together.
